prompt: Abstract illustration of an ecosystem trust network: glowing nodes and links forming a subtle shield-and-chain motif, representing governance, trust, and supply-chain security in automation ecosystems.
style: minimal premium tech poster, semi-vector + soft 3D, subtle grain, dark background
composition: wide landscape; centered network motif; ample negative space near top and sides for page gradients; no text
lighting: soft volumetric glow, rim-lit edges, high contrast without harsh bloom
palette: deep navy/black base, neon violet + electric cyan highlights, small warm amber accents
materials: matte glass nodes, thin luminous lines, brushed metal accents
constraints: no text; no logos; no watermark; no trademarks
negative: no people; no faces; no photo-real stock-photo look; avoid clutter; avoid oversaturation; avoid cheesy lens flare

prompt: Abstract illustration of a curated toolkit and deployment baseline: floating modular cards and cubes arranged like a checklist and server stack, with a subtle checkmark and shield silhouette to imply practical recommendations and security hardening.
style: minimal premium tech poster, semi-vector + soft 3D, subtle grain, dark background
composition: wide landscape; layered modules/cubes; strong diagonals; leave quiet negative space for header overlays; no text
lighting: soft studio glow with gentle shadows, crisp edges
palette: deep navy/black base, neon violet highlights, secondary teal glow, warm amber accents
materials: matte polymer blocks, glassy UI-card surfaces, fine grid texture
constraints: no text; no logos; no watermark; no trademarks
negative: no people; no faces; no photoreal stock-photo look; avoid clutter; avoid oversaturation

prompt: Abstract cover art for a fast-moving ecosystem story: a marketplace grid and map contour lines, a rocket-like ascent icon and warning signal motif, implying rapid rise, delisting, and security allegations; tense but minimal.
style: minimal premium tech poster, semi-vector + soft 3D, subtle grain, dark background
composition: wide landscape; bold central icon; subtle motion lines; negative space around edges; no text
lighting: dramatic glow from the central icon, controlled contrast
palette: deep navy/black base, neon cyan + violet highlights, warning red/orange accent
materials: matte glass + brushed metal, fine grid texture
constraints: no text; no logos; no watermark; no trademarks
negative: no people; no faces; no photoreal stock-photo look; avoid clutter; avoid oversaturation
